This is cool stuff and you will be able to find a lot of cool information 
                in the following documentation https://rustyeddy.com/otto/

Usage:
  otto [flags]
  otto [command]

Available Commands:
  cli         Run auto in interactive CLI mode
  completion  Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
  help        Help about any command
  stations    Get station information
  stats       Display runtime stats
  version     Print the version number of otto

Flags:
      --format string   choices are <human | json> default json (default "json")
  -h, --help            help for otto
      --server string   Otto server URL (e.g., http://localhost:8011) (default "http://localhost:8011")

Use "otto [command] --help" for more information about a command.
